EFFECT: Fragile. Free. Can't attack.
NAME: Featherball

NAME: Send Flying

NAME: Falcon

NAME: Tornado

NAME: Zephyr

NAME: Ice Crane

EFFECT: Whenever a friendly creature is destroyed : put it back into your hand.
NAME: Dodge

NAME: Fury Elemental

NAME: Burning Pain

EFFECT: Lose 2 HP. Put onto the battlefield any Dragon among HPs lost this way.
NAME: Light it Up

EFFECT: Condition : you must have no cards left in your HP. Bonus effect : draw a card.
NAME: Explosion

EFFECT: Powerful. Destruction : look at your opponent's hand and put a creature onto his battlefield.
NAME: Strongscales

NAME: Salamander

NAME: Geonaut

EFFECT: Damage all undamaged creatures.
NAME: Rock Slash

NAME: Smite

NAME: Avalanche

NAME: Mountain

NAME: Agressive Stance

NAME: Archangel
